mapper.select: SELECT a.engagement_info_id pkInfoId, a.engagement_title title, a.start_time pktime, CONCAT(a.city_name,'-',a.district_name) region, a.address, a.cost_plan costContent, CASE WHEN NOW()> a.sign_up_end_time AND a.status = 0 THEN 2 ELSE a.status END pkStatus, CASE WHEN NOW()> a.sign_up_end_time AND a.status = 0 THEN '已过期' WHEN a.status = 0 THEN '待约战' ELSE '约战成功' END pkStatusStr, (SELECT title FROM class WHERE id = a.engagement_type) pkMarchType, a.team_id teamId, b.team_name teamName, b.team_logo logpPath, a.create_time teamTime, d.team_info_id confirmTeamId, d.team_name confirmTeamName, d.team_logo confirmTeamLogoPath, a.user_id createUserId FROM engagement_info a LEFT JOIN engagement_team_apply c ON a.engagement_info_id = c.engagement_info_id AND audit_status = 1 LEFT JOIN team_info d ON c.team_id = d.team_info_id, team_info b WHERE a.team_id = b.team_info_id AND a.engagement_info_id = #{pkInfoId}

SELECT c.team_info_id applyTeamId, c.team_name applyTeamName, c.team_logo applyTeamLogoPath FROM engagement_info a, engagement_team_apply b, team_info c WHERE a.engagement_info_id = b.engagement_info_id AND b.team_id = c.team_info_id AND audit_status = 0 AND a.engagement_info_id = #{pkInfoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO engagement_info ( engagement_title, provice_id, provice_name, city_id, city_name, district_id, district_name, address, cost_plan, engagement_type, team_id, team_tel, team_uniform_color, team_upper_limit, start_time, duration, engagement_synopsis, sign_up_end_time, user_id ) SELECT #{paramEntity.title}, x.province_id, x.province_name, x.city_id, x.city_name, y.district_id, y.district_name, #{paramEntity.address}, #{paramEntity.costContent}, #{paramEntity.pkMarchType}, z.team_info_id, z.mobile, #{paramEntity.teamJerseyColor}, #{paramEntity.teamMemberTotal}, #{paramEntity.pkStartTime}, #{paramEntity.pkDuration}, #{paramEntity.briefing}, #{paramEntity.pkSignUpEndTime}, #{user.userId} FROM ( SELECT a.province_id, a.province_name, b.city_id, b.city_name FROM region_province a, region_city b WHERE a.province_id = b.province_id AND b.city_id = #{paramEntity.cityId} ) x LEFT JOIN ( SELECT district_id, district_name FROM region_district WHERE district_id = #{paramEntity.districtId} ) y ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT team_info_id,mobile FROM team_info WHERE team_info_id = 1 ) z ON 1 = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE engagement_info a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.province_id, a.province_name, b.city_id, b.city_name FROM region_province a, region_city b WHERE a.province_id = b.province_id AND b.city_id = #{paramEntity.cityId} ) x ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT district_id, district_name FROM region_district WHERE district_id = #{paramEntity.districtId} ) y ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT team_info_id,mobile FROM team_info WHERE team_info_id = 1 ) z ON 1 = 1 SET a.engagement_title = #{paramEntity.title}, a.provice_id = x.province_id, a.provice_name = x.province_name, a.city_id = x.city_id, a.city_name = x.city_name, a.district_id = y.district_id, a.district_name = y.district_name, a.address = #{paramEntity.address}, a.cost_plan = #{paramEntity.costContent}, a.engagement_type = #{paramEntity.pkMarchType}, a.team_id = z.team_info_id, a.team_tel = z.mobile, a.team_uniform_color = #{paramEntity.teamJerseyColor}, a.team_upper_limit = #{paramEntity.teamMemberTotal}, a.start_time = #{paramEntity.pkStartTime}, a.duration = #{paramEntity.pkDuration}, a.engagement_synopsis = #{paramEntity.briefing}, a.sign_up_end_time = #{paramEntity.pkSignUpEndTime} WHERE a.engagement_info_id = #{paramEntity.pkInfoId}
UPDATE engagement_info SET del_flag = 0 WHERE engagement_info_id = #{pkInfoId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO engagement_team_apply ( engagement_info_id, team_id, team_uniform_color, team_upper_limit, contacts, contacts_tel, briefing, user_id ) VALUES ( #{paramEntity.pkInfoId}, #{paramEntity.teamId}, #{paramEntity.teamJerseyColor}, #{paramEntity.teamMemberTotal}, #{paramEntity.contacts}, #{paramEntity.contactsTel}, #{paramEntity.briefing}, #{user.userId} )
